channel.title: Huge error when running client :( (please help me someone this gets annoying)
channel.description:
hello... when i run my client under ubuntu/linux i get this error :(
[code] Read Error: bhicon1 Read Error: bhicon2 Read Error: bhicon3 Read Error: bhicon4 Read Error: bhicon5 Read Error: admindot Read Error: modicon1 Read Error: modicon2 loading custom spirts part 1
